overview: New York, post 9/11: Armed with a home video camera and no script, the director delves into the private lives of four women artists and transgender activists from the cityâ€™s underground subculture, filming their lives over a period of 10 years. Little by little, their testimonies reveal fragments of their pasts, their experiences and their struggles for an identity of their own. A series of revelations transform the viewer from feeling like an intruder to being invested in their destinies.
title: I Hate New York
